meanings.sent1: The park was filled with playful sproglets running around.
meanings.sent2: The nursery was full of adorable sproglets taking their naps.
meanings.sent3: The sproglets giggled as they played peek-a-boo.
meanings.sent4: The classroom buzzed with the energy of the little sproglets.
meanings.sent5: The sproglets' laughter echoed through the playground.

meanings.definition: To give birth to or produce offspring.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit sproglets in the springtime.
meanings.sent2: The apple tree sproglets delicious fruit every year.
meanings.sent3: The garden seemed to sproglets new flowers overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas sproglets creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The artist's mind sproglets endless possibilities.
